Package com.ibm.websphere.personalization

Interface Summary
PznGeolocationInterface Defines methods for resolving a user's geographical location.
PznHttpRequestObjectInterface This is the interface used to access the base HttpRequest that is backing a PznRequestObjectInterface.
PznPortletRequestObjectInterface This is the interface used to access various Portal-sepecific attributes for rules.
PznRequestObjectInfoInterface This interface is used to retrieve information about a request object.
PznRequestObjectInterface This is the interface used to access various attributes for rules.
RequestContext This is the interface used to access various attributes for rules.
RuleExit The item is designed to provide the ability to alter the default flow of processing of content spots.
 

Class Summary
ContentSpot
PznGeolocationInterface.GeoAddress This class stores elements of a geographical address.
PznGeolocationInterface.GeoCoords This class stores geographical coordinates.
PznGeolocationInterface.GeoLocation This class stores a geographical location, including both coordinates and address.
PznPortletRequestObjectImplementor This object acts as a simulated request object for Personalization API calls when an instance of HttpServletRequest or PortletRequest is not available.
PznRequestObjectImplementor This object acts as a simulated request object for Personalization API calls when an instance of HttpServletRequest or PortletRequest is not available.
RuleTrigger This class is used to trigger a Personalization rule.
 

Exception Summary
PersonalizationException This class represents an exception that can be thrown from the Personalization component.
